All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
CitiesManager
 
CitiesManagerCurrent
The cities manager specify the method getJSONString for getting current weather, so it is used with ForecastCurrent
CitiesManagerDaily
The cities manager specify the method getJSONString for getting daily weather, so it is used with ForecastDaily
CitiesManagerHourly
The cities manager specify the method getJSONString for getting hourly weather, so it is used with ForecastHourly
CitiesManagerImpl
 
CitiesManagerMorDayEveNight
The cities manager specify the method getJSONString for getting daily weather informations grouped in dayslot, so it is used with ForecastDayMorEveNight
